headline: Does the FedEx Share Price Slide Create an Opportunity in 2025?
summary: Thinking about what to do with your FedEx shares? You are not alone. Investors everywhere have been weighing their options after watching the stock swing lower in recent months. FedEx closed most recently at $224.63, even after what has been a challenging stretch. Over the last week alone, shares have dropped 8.2%, with a 30-day decline of 2.1% and a year-to-date loss of 18.1%. Long-term holders might have mixed emotions, since a big jump of 52.9% over three years stands out, even though the...
